DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate health status uncontrolled Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) patient response treatment clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Evaluate Health Status Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Patients Response Real-life Treatments Thailand
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provision inform consent prior study specific procedures 2 . Male nonpregnant female age > 40 year 3 . A clinical diagnosis COPD FEV1/ FVC < 0.70 require combination modify therapy 4 . Smoke > 10 Pack Year 1 . Involvement plan and/or conduct study ( applies AstraZeneca staff and/or staff study site ) 2 . Participation clinical study ( preclude noninterventional study registry ) last 3 month
